title: Elevated land with paddy views for sale near Heenatigala, Galle
details: This plot of terraced land, with views of the surrounding paddy fields, is conveniently located in the ‘Happy valley’ which is just a 15 minute drive from Galle Fort and only a 5 minute drive from Talpe Beach. With local shops within walking distance of the property, this represents a perfect spot on which to build a holiday home.
